column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My girlfriends and I tried several cocktails
column2: but I particularly loved their sparkling rose.  We started with the baked goat cheese
column3: which came with slices of toasty
column4: crusty bread.  Followed up with some oysters.  I went with the braised veal cheeks....sooo rich and delicious.  My friends both selected the beef stroganoff
column5: which was an elegant version of what mom used to make.   Sorry mom
column6: but Bavette's stroganoff is way better!
